LOGIN.HEADING: Log in to Artstor Admin
LOGIN.TERMS: By using Artstor Digital Library, I agree to the Terms
LOGIN.LOGIN_HELP: Having trouble logging in? Contact userservices@artstor.org

MESSAGES.UNAUTHORIZED: Invalid email address or password. Try again.
MESSAGES.SERVICE_ERROR: Server is not responding. Please try again later.
MESSAGES.USERNAME_REQUIRED: Please enter the email associated with your Admin account.
MESSAGES.PASSWORD_REQUIRED: Please enter the password associated with your Admin account

ARTSTOR_STATS.CONTENT: For usage statistics go to the Artstor Stats Site

QUESTIONS_TRAINING.CONTENT: UserServices@artstor.org with questions and to schedule an Admin training online.

PROMO.HDR: Need materials to promote Artstor at your institution?
PROMO.CONTENT: Go to Promotional materials for more information.

LOCAL_SUPPORT.TXT2: Go to User accounts to assign Admin privileges to another user.

MESSAGES.UNAUTHORIZED: Unauthorized user. Please sign-in with admin account.
MESSAGES.SERVICE_ERROR: Server is not responding. Please try again later.

REGISTER_MODAL.INVALID_EMAIL_ALERT: {{ email }} is not a valid email address and was removed.
REGISTER_MODAL.USER_REGISTRATION_ERROR: Registration failed for {{ email }}. Please try again, or contact support.
REGISTER_MODAL.EMAIL_REQUIRED_ERROR: At least one email is required
REGISTER_MODAL.SERVICE_ERROR: There was an issue processing your request. Please try again or contact support.

SESSION_EXPIRE.MESSAGE: We logged you out after being idle for 90 minutes. Please login again.
